name: How to Win Friends and Influence People
specifications: A timeless bestseller, Dale Carnegie’s How to Win Friends and Influence People has been an inspiration for many of those who are now famous and successful. with principles that stand as relevant in modern times as ever before, it continues to help people on their way to success.
reviews: Best thing about this book is,its writings are applicable even after 100 years of authors birth age.When there was no computers and no mobile phones and no internet,his writings and concepts are futuristic approach.Human and their psychology is still the same and will be the same in Era of AI.After reading this definitely you will think twice before making a stupid decision on emotional outburst.Happy reading.

name: The Subtle Art of Not Giving a F*ck
specifications: A much-needed grab-you-by-the-shoulders-and-look-you-in the-eye moment of real talk, filled with entertaining stories and profane, ruthless humor, The Subtle Art of Not Giving a F**k is a refreshing slap for a generation to help them truly lead contented, grounded lives.
reviews: This book is a game changer. It makes you think in a way you never have.. Must read for people who think they are depressed, 'something is wrong with me',, 'why me' type of questions.. Trust me there is nothing wrong with you.. an eye opener for me truly. Just order it already !!!

name: Think and Grow Rich
specifications: The book details out the most fundamental questions that once bothered the author, Napoleon Hill. The author once set out on a personal quest to find out what really made some people so successful. Why is it that some people manage to remain healthy, happy and financially independent, all at the same time? Why, after all, do some end up being called as lucky? The answers, no wonder, had to be no less than revelations.
reviews: This book is amazing. when you read this. this book break your myth of life. and when u had completed this book u feel special. Thanks Napoleon hill.

name: Rich Dad Poor Dad: What the Rich Teach their Kids About Money that the Poor and Middle Class Do Not!
specifications: As always, readers can expect that Robert will be candid, insightful and continue to rock more than a few boats in his retrospective. Will there be a few surprises? Count on it. Rich dad poor dad
reviews: For those who are not understanding where their money goes. This book may change you outlook to see money. It will inspire and encourage to think something about money. After working for 5-8 years if you do have 0 investments then please read this book at once, it may give you a way to walk towards money handling path.

name: Three Thousand Stitches: Ordinary People, Extraordinary Lives
specifications: So often, it's the simplest acts of courage that touch the lives of others. Sudha Murty-through the exceptional work of the Infosys Foundation as well as through her own youth, family life and travels-encounters many such stories
reviews: Well, after reading first few para of first story, i felt what have i picked but at the end of the story i felt i didn't make the mistake by buying this book. Someday, if possible, would like to meet the author..:)
